actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-859, by Ms. Sutton.

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. The amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution shall be considered as adopted.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 268.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1449.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 187 (Roll no. 605).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 190 (Roll no. 606).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6604) to amend the Commodity Exchange Act to bring greater transparency and accountability to commodity markets, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6604) to amend the Commodity Exchange Act to bring greater transparency and accountability to commodity markets.

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6604) to amend the Commodity Exchange Act to bring greater transparency and accountability to commodity markets, and for other purposes.
